I heard there is bus service from here to Brian Park Skate Rink...
...and I want to know the bus schedule.
How often does the bus operate in the daytime?
The bus from Brian Park operates every thirty minutes from 10:00 AM through 3:00 PM.
Here is the bus schedule so you can check it.
And how much is the bus fare?
It is 2 dollars for an adult, and 90 cents for a kid.
The bus in the morning on weekends is rather crowded these days.
